document_data.name: Tred McKnuckles
document_data.mainbody: '''Tred McKnuckles''' was a stout dwarf with a yellow beard. He wore a throwing hammer on the back of each shoulder. He was a skilled blacksmith and farrier, and was often called upon by King [[Emerus Warcrown]] to shoe horses.
document_data.Relatives: Tred had a brother called [[Duggan McKnuckles]]
document_data.Equipment: Tred used a single-bladed [[axe]] with a point at its tip, and also a double-bladed axe.
document_data.Background:
During late winter when it was attacked by a band of [[orc]]s and boulder-hurling [[frost giant]]s. Tred was injured during this attack, and only he and Nikwillig survived. They stumbled across the hamlet of [[Clicking Heels]] where they were given food and healing, before continuing their journey, encountering [[Bruenor Battlehammer]]'s caravan, and joining up with them.
